text: Ndipo anthu opembedza mafano amati, “Mulungu akadafuna, ife kapena makolo athu, sitikadapembedza milungu ina yoonjezera pa Mulungu weniweni ayi ndiponso ife sitikadaletsa china chilichonse opanda chilolezo chake.” Mmenemo ndimo adachitira anthu amene adalipo kale iwo asanadze. Kodi Atumwi adapatsidwa china kupatula kupereka Uthenga momveka
